text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
Miracle, I don't believe you have need 
to wait here with me.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha…… I'm not waiting here. 
I just want to talk with you.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: So is it okay if I stay a bit longer?

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
…… You have however kept me company for
over ten minutes as I await the arrival
of my butler.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, but I'm having fun talking to
you. About the things you learned during
recent joint training runs, and how
delicious the black tea you had sent
over was, and such.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
I like those kinds of stories. 
I want to keep talking about 
simple things like that.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
If that is what you wish, by all means. 
Let us continue.
